# AiZaVseki (АИ За Всеки)

> AI education platform for Bulgarian-speaking audiences. All content is in Bulgarian.

## About
AiZaVseki explains artificial intelligence in simple, human language for Bulgarian audiences. We cover AI news, tools, tips, business applications, and fun AI experiments — published daily via an automated AI content pipeline.

## Key Pages
- Homepage: https://aizavseki.eu
- Blog: https://aizavseki.eu/blog
- AI Новини (News): https://aizavseki.eu/blog/ai-novini
- AI Инструменти (Tools): https://aizavseki.eu/blog/ai-instrumenti
- AI Съвети (Tips): https://aizavseki.eu/blog/ai-saveti
- AI за Бизнес (Business): https://aizavseki.eu/blog/ai-za-biznes
- AI Забавления (Fun): https://aizavseki.eu/blog/ai-zabavlenia
- AI Речник (Glossary): https://aizavseki.eu/resources/rechnik
- Resources: https://aizavseki.eu/resources
- About: https://aizavseki.eu/about
- Contact: https://aizavseki.eu/contact
- Newsletter: https://aizavseki.eu/newsletter

## Content Details
- Language: Bulgarian (bg)
- Topics: AI news, AI tools, AI tips, AI for business, AI fun
- Format: Daily articles with structured sections, FAQ, key takeaways
- Structured data: Article, FAQPage, HowTo, BreadcrumbList, Organization, WebSite, CollectionPage, DefinedTermSet
- Content is AI-generated and reviewed for quality

## Technical
- Framework: Next.js 16
- Sitemap: https://aizavseki.eu/sitemap.xml
- Robots: https://aizavseki.eu/robots.txt

## Contact
- Email: contact@aizavseki.eu

- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/aizavseki
